FirstName.description: The first name. This is required if you are using Amazon Connect or SAML for identity management.

LastName.description: The last name. This is required if you are using Amazon Connect or SAML for identity management.

Email.description: The email address. If you are using SAML for identity management and include this parameter, an error is returned.

SecondaryEmail.description: The secondary email address. If you provide a secondary email, the user receives email notifications -- other than password reset notifications -- to this email address instead of to their primary email address.

SecurityProfileArn.description: The identifier of the security profile for the user.

AfterContactWorkTimeLimit.description: The After Call Work (ACW) timeout setting, in seconds.

DeskPhoneNumber.description: The phone number for the user's desk phone.

UserIdentityInfo.description: Contains information about the identity of a user.

UserPhoneConfig.description: Contains information about the phone configuration settings for a user.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is maximum of 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

InstanceArn.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance.

DirectoryUserId.description: The identifier of the user account in the directory used for identity management.

HierarchyGroupArn.description: The identifier of the hierarchy group for the user.

Username.description: The user name for the account.

Password.description: The password for the user account. A password is required if you are using Amazon Connect for identity management. Otherwise, it is an error to include a password.

RoutingProfileArn.description: The identifier of the routing profile for the user.

IdentityInfo.description: The information about the identity of the user.

PhoneConfig.description: The phone settings for the user.

SecurityProfileArns.description: One or more security profile arns for the user

UserArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the user.
